instructions.title: How to use HTML Encoder/Decoder

steps.title: Choose encoding or decoding mode
steps.description: Select 'Encode' to convert text to HTML entities, or 'Decode' to convert HTML entities back to plain text. The tool auto-detects entities in your input.

steps.title: Select encoding options (for encode mode)
steps.description: Choose from special characters only, named entities, decimal, hexadecimal, or encode all characters. Each option serves different use cases.

steps.title: Paste or type your text
steps.description: Enter the text you want to process. The conversion happens instantly as you type, with real-time character counting and entity detection.

steps.title: Copy or reprocess the result
steps.description: Use the copy button to save the output to clipboard, or swap input/output to process the result again with a different mode.

features: Character counter for input and output
